title: ClassLogger
description: AI-powered mobile attendance system that prevents proxy marking using facial recognition and classroom WiFi verification. Built with an Android (Kotlin) frontend and a Python FastAPI backend using FaceNet embeddings and KNN-based identity matching.

title: credit-card-defaults
description: Credit risk prediction model built on the UCI dataset with a focus on business impact over raw accuracy. Engineered behavioral features from repayment history and optimized a Random Forest with threshold tuning to improve default recall to 61%, prioritizing early risk detection.

title: UIDAI-Hackathon
description: Interactive national-level dashboard built for UIDAI Hackathon 2026 to measure Digital Equity across 645+ districts. Features drill-down analytics, risk classification, and AI-driven district recommendations using a Streamlit-based data visualization system.

title: Motion Security Detector
description: A minimal security system replica for motion detection using basic image processing.
